content: **this blanket is inspired by beautiful all-in-one knitted baby blankets and includes a make-as-you-go border it is designed to have fewer holes than a typical crochet blanket making it cosy and warm ** please note that baby blankets should only be used under adult supervision a pared-down free version of this pattern uk terms only with no photo tutorial is available from https //www fionameadecrochet com/free-patterns 1 **level** this pattern is suitable for improving beginners and beyond it includes video tutorials for all the main stitches and a photo tutorial for the pattern **size** the finished blanket is approx 60-65cm x 60-65cm approx 24-25 x 24-25 inches i am a reasonably firm crocheter and my blanket comes up at 60cm square if you are a looser crocheter your blanket will come up a little bigger the paid pattern includes instructions for how to increase the blanket size **choosing your yarn** consider the end user of your blanket you may like to use a yarn that can be machine washed or tumble dried this pattern works well with single colours as well as speckled and multicoloured yarns **you will need** 225-250g 675-750m of double knit dk / light worsted yarn 4mm crochet hook for the main blanket 4 5mm crochet hook for the starting chain 5mm if you are a very tight chainer yarn needle & scissors this pattern includes a full photo tutorial linked video tutorials are included for all the stitches used left and right handed versions of the pattern are available as well as versions in uk and us terms a crochet chart is also included **terms and conditions of use ** *do not copy these notes images or charts either digitally or in hard copy do not share them online this pattern is for personal use only you can sell the items you make but you must credit me fiona meade crochet as the designer and link to this pattern on ravelry you do not have permission to use my photographs for promotion please take your own pictures you are not allowed to make photo or video tutorials for this pattern online or off-line if you wish to use this pattern in a class or as part of a kit you must seek full written permission from me fionameade crochet@gmail com and you must buy a full price copy of the pattern for each individual kit/participant * 1 https //www fionameadecrochet com/free-patterns
